text.text:
Overview --- - Creator of every universe. - It is aware it is fictional.
- Every universe is a franchise. - There is no multiverse other than the
ones explicitly created by Glooey. Glooey is the primordial Lightsprite,
creator of the Grand Tale universe and avatar of The Light. # Appearance
--- Glooey is made entirely of The Light and has no need for a physical
body, but occasionally chooses to visibly manifest itself to interact with
other beings, doing so in two different forms. In its Primeval Form it
possesses a _ visage. Its body is ethereal energy with a royal blue tint .
It possesses three sets of wings. In its Corporeal Form it is very similar
to its Spiritual Form, but with much more subtle features. # Personality
--- Glooey is usually uninterested in directly intervening in any of the
universe's affairs. It acts mostly as an observer, but is open to being
interacted with should any find the means to. It often manifests itself at
important moments, but only shows itself in its Primeval Form for
exceptionally significant events. # Biography --- Glooey was birthed from
the Light itself in the beginning of all things. Shortly after its
creation it spawned the universe and the six Elder Artifacts, spreading
them across the cosmos to create an environment within which stories could
unfold. # Relationships --- # Abilities --- Glooey is both omnipotent and
omniscient, as well as immortal. It is also able to break the 4th Wall and
directly reference the user. # Trivia --- - Glooey's Corporeal Form is the
official Rimelight Entertainment mascot, being often used in branding and
even as an information vector for tutorials and the like. - Glooey's
visual design was inspired by the Glaucus atlanticus, a blue sea slug
native to temperate and tropical waters around the globe. ## Etymology ---
